page.title: 16The Vicar of Filey,Mr,Curtis
page.content: The day may begin with prayer and a bible reading with the curate.After breakfast the morning is spent with the post and preperations for the services,confirmation classes and Bible reading groups.Visiting the sick and taking Holy Communion to those unable to attend church take up the rest of the morning. Mr.Curtis sometimes entertains at Over 60's clubs with songs accompanied by his accordion or with his magic act.There are also evening meetings of the Fellowship Club,Prayer Group,choir practice and youth club. Mr.Curtis is a member of the local tennis club and Filey Amateur Variety Association,he likes to meet people casually and makes a point of shopping locally on Saturdays.He has also to deal with administration of the three church buildings.
